description.japanese: セーシェルでタマカイのノンモを釣る
description.polish: Złów na Seszelach granika wielkiego zwanego Nommo
description.portuguese: Pegue o canapuguaçu Nommo, no Seicheles
description.russian: Поймайте Номмо, индоокеанского групера с Сейшельских островов
description.schinese: 在塞舌尔钓上鞍带石斑鱼“诺莫”
description.spanish: Capture a Nommo, el mero gigante, en las Seychelles
description.tchinese: 在塞席爾釣鞍帶石斑魚「諾莫」

description.brazilian: Pegue um peixe de pelo menos 20 kg
description.english: Catch a fish that weighs at least 20 kg
description.french: Pêcher un poisson pesant au moins 20 kg
description.german: Fangen Sie einen Fisch mit mindestens 20 kg Gewicht
description.italian: Cattura un pesce che pesi almeno 20 kg
description.japanese: 最低20kgの魚を釣る
description.polish: Złów rybę o wadze co najmniej 20 kg
description.portuguese: Pegue um peixe de pelo menos 20 kg
description.schinese: 钓上一条至少 20 公斤的鱼
description.spanish: Capture un pez que pese al menos 20 kg
description.tchinese: 釣一條重達 20 公斤的魚

description.brazilian: Tenha pelo menos 5.000 moedas
description.french: Posséder au moins 5 000 pièces
description.italian: Ottieni almeno 5000 monete
description.japanese: 最低5,000枚のコインを持つ
description.polish: Posiadaj co najmniej 5000 monet
description.portuguese: Tenha pelo menos 5.000 moedas
description.schinese: 拥有至少 5000 个金币

description.brazilian: Arrebente a linha 10 vezes enquanto captura um peixe
description.english: Break the line 10 times while landing a fish
description.french: Casser la ligne 10 fois en sortant un poisson
description.german: Zerreißen Sie 10 Mal die Schnur beim Einholen eines Fischs
description.italian: Spezza la lenza 10 volte mentre porti a riva un pesce
description.japanese: 魚を釣り上げる最中にラインを10回切る
description.polish: Zerwij 10 razy żyłkę podczas wyciągania ryby z wody
description.portuguese: Arrebente a linha 10 vezes enquanto captura um peixe
description.schinese: 溜鱼时断线 10 次
description.spanish: Rompa el sedal 10 veces al capturar un pez
description.tchinese: 在釣魚時弄斷釣線 10 次

description.brazilian: Pegue um total de 80 metros de comprimento de peixes
description.english: Catch fish totalling at least 80 meters in length
description.french: Pêcher une longueur totale d'au moins 80 mètres de poisson
description.german: Fangen Sie Fische, die insgesamt eine Länge von mindestens 80 Metern ergeben
description.italian: Cattura pesci per una lunghezza complessiva di almeno 80 metri
description.japanese: 最低合計80mの長さの魚を釣る
description.koreana: 길이를 합치면 총 80미터 이상 될 만큼의 물고기 잡기
description.polish: Złów ryby o łącznej długości co najmniej 80 metrów
description.portuguese: Pegue um total de 80 metros de comprimento de peixes
description.russian: Поймайте рыбы суммарно на 80 метров длиной
description.schinese: 钓上总长至少 80 米的鱼
description.spanish: Capture peces con un total de 80 metros de longitud
description.tchinese: 釣總長 80 米以上的魚
